name: Pain Clinic
overview: The Pain Clinic is a pro wrestling talk show that airs on Sportsradio 1280 WHTK in Rochester, New York. The show was created by Sam Fantauzzo and Rich Jones and debuted on November 14, 1998, with "Dr. Love", "the Cashman" Richie Rich, and "Mad Dog" Bobby Rodgers as hosts. The show covers the major news and interviews the who's who in the world of wrestling. It will celebrate its 15th year on the air on 1280 WHTK this November. The show can be heard online at whtk.com and the mobile phone iheartradio app.
